isis.stitle: TSI 92-03-02 - Hendrickson Air Suspension U-Bolt Torque

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to 8000 and 9000 Series Models.

When Navistar installs Hendrickson air suspension on an International vehicle, it is installed with Navistar's own nuts and washers ( Figure 1). The nuts and washers are the same as used on International Air Ride Suspension. The nuts are cadmium plated and also have a nylon locking feature.

It is very important when repairing or performing maintenance on Hendrickson air suspension that the U-bolt nuts are torqued to the same torque specifications as required on the International air ride suspension: 260 to 300 ft-lbs.

note.para: Do not torque the U-bolts to Hendrickson's air suspension torque specification of 400 to 450 ft-lbs. - Use International's value of 260 to 300 ft-lbs. on International vehicles.
